markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Limited">
[Dreaming Potential](/Spells.aspx?ID=1504)
<actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 327 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Aegirran](/Deities.aspx?ID=490), [Arshea](/Deities.aspx?ID=465), [Bharnarol](/Deities.aspx?ID=467), [Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=281), [Granduncle Taproot](/Deities.aspx?ID=665), [Saloc](/Deities.aspx?ID=547), [Shei](/Deities.aspx?ID=653), [Tlehar](/Deities.aspx?ID=681)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 10 minutes

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing sleeping creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 8 hours
</row>

</column>

---

You draw the target into a lucid dream where it can explore the endless possibilities of its own potential within the everchanging backdrop of its dreamscape. If it sleeps the full 8 hours uninterrupted, when it wakes, it counts as having spent a day of downtime [retraining](/Rules.aspx?ID=475), though it can't use dreaming potential for any retraining that would require either an instructor or specialized knowledge it can't access within the dream.
name: Dreaming Potential

**Deities**
[Aegirran](/Deities.aspx?ID=490), [Arshea](/Deities.aspx?ID=465), [Bharnarol](/Deities.aspx?ID=467), [Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=281), [Granduncle Taproot](/Deities.aspx?ID=665), [Saloc](/Deities.aspx?ID=547), [Shei](/Deities.aspx?ID=653), [Tlehar](/Deities.aspx?ID=681)

</row>

**Target** 1 willing sleeping creature
</row>

**Duration** 8 hours
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
The target retrains in its dreams.
</summary>
summary: The target retrains in its dreams.
summary_markdown: The target retrains in its dreams.
text: Dreaming Potential Source Player Core pg. 327 2.0 Tradition Occult Deities Aegirran, Arshea, Bharnarol, Desna, Granduncle Taproot, Saloc, Shei, Tlehar Cast 10 minutes Range touch Target 1 willing sleeping creature Duration 8 hours --- You draw the target into a lucid dream where it can explore the endless possibilities of its own potential within the everchanging backdrop of its dreamscape. If it sleeps the full 8 hours uninterrupted, when it wakes, it counts as having spent a day of downtime retraining, though it can't use dreaming potential for any retraining that would require either an instructor or specialized knowledge it can't access within the dream.
